verses.text: \w Her|strong="H5921"\w* \w time|strong="H5750"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* hand, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* days \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* prolonged. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* joined \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* adhere \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5117"\w* thee \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thy labour, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thy vexation, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w*, wherewith thou didst \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w before|strong="H4480"\w*,

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w rulers|strong="H4910"\w*,

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w still|strong="H8252"\w*, \w it|strong="H5117"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* glad \w and|strong="H0776"\w* hath rejoiced.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Libanus, saying: \w Since|strong="H0227"\w* thou hast \w slept|strong="H7901"\w*, \w there|strong="H5927"\w* hath \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*.

Hell \w below|strong="H8478"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* uproar \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* thee \w at|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w coming|strong="H0935"\w*, \w it|strong="H0935"\w* \w stirred|strong="H5782"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* giants \w for|strong="H8478"\w* thee. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w thrones|strong="H3678"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: Thou \w also|strong="H1571"\w* art \w wounded|strong="H2470"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w*, thou art become \w like|strong="H3644"\w* unto \w us|strong="H0413"\w*.

Thy \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* is \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* hell, thy carcass is \w fallen|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*: \w under|strong="H8478"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* moth be strewed, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w worms|strong="H8438"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* be thy \w covering|strong="H4374"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0349"\w* art thou \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, O Lucifer, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* didst rise \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*? \w how|strong="H0349"\w* art thou \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w that|strong="H5307"\w* didst wound \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*?

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* thou art \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0068"\w* thy \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, \w as|strong="H3381"\w* \w an|strong="H7993"\w* unprofitable \w branch|strong="H5342"\w* defiled, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* wrapped \w up|strong="H0413"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H6913"\w* \w were|strong="H0068"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* art \w gone|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* bottom \w of|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, \w as|strong="H3381"\w* \w a|strong="H7993"\w* rotten carcass.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Surely|strong="H0518"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w thought|strong="H0559"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w purposed|strong="H3289"\w*,
